text: Paris a city that's been gripped by
terror which has left France a nation on
the highest alert this is what that
looks like hundreds of extra police and
troops deployed on the streets of the
capital in response to the heightened
threat the French president saying the
country must remain vigilant in three
days 17 people have been killed in a
series of attacks four of them in a
siege at a Jewish supermarket amedy
coulibaly killed them before he himself
was killed in the police raid that
followed calibre Lee's mother and sister
have condemned his actions and say they
do not share his extreme ideas but his
partner Hyatt boumedienne has not yet
been found the security services believe
that she flew to Turkey on the 2nd of
January then crossed the border into
Syria it's thought that is where she may
now be back in Paris a neighbor said
they seemed like an ordinary couple the
woman was always entirely veiled they
weren't mean people they would say hello
goodbye they would hold the door I
bumped into them many times but they
were very nice never any problems as
tributes grow outside the Charlie Hebdo
office where 12 people were killed
investigations are underway it's thought
the suspects the Kawachi brothers may
have had links to al-qaeda in Yemen
Sharif Kawachi wife is being questioned
while the hunt for boumedienne continues
the fugitive who remains France's most
wanted woman been gland BBC news
